    • Method Detail

      • buildBranchStmt

        public int buildBranchStmt(BranchStmt branch,
                           int index)
        Builds the node for return, break, and continue statements
        Parameters:
        branch - The root node of this branch statement
        index - The index of branch's token in lex
        Returns:
        The index at the end of this statement

      • buildCaseStmt

        public int buildCaseStmt(CaseStmt stmt,
                         int index)
        Builds the node that holds the case expression and its body
        Parameters:
        stmt - The root node of this case
        index - The index of stmt's token in lex
        Returns:
        The index at the end of this statement (the colon)

      • buildTypeDecl

        public int buildTypeDecl(TypeDecl type,

      • buildPrintStmt

        public int buildPrintStmt(PrintStmt print,
                          int index)
        Basic implementation of accepting print statements. It knows the kind of print statement and what's being printed.
        Parameters:
        print - The type of print statement (print, println, printf, etc)
        index - The index of print's token in lex
        Returns:
        The index at the end of this statement

      • buildVarDecl

        public int buildVarDecl(VarDecl var,
                        int index)
        Builds the node for variable declarations whether single or multiple declarations in one statement
        Parameters:
        var - The root node of the variable declaration (holds the type as its token)
        index - The index of var's token in lex
        Returns:
        The index at the end of this statement

      • buildVarDeclHelper

        public java.util.ArrayList<VarDecl> buildVarDeclHelper(java.util.ArrayList<VarDecl> list,
                                                       int index)
        Helper to buildVarDecl(). Used for multiple declarations in one statement.
        Parameters:
        list - The list of variable declarations to be added to
        index - The index of the new variable declaration (where the variable name is) in lex
        Returns:
        The list of variable declarations with the new one added to it

      • buildVarDeclArray

        public int buildVarDeclArray(VarDeclArray var,
                             int index)
        Builds the node for array variable declarations whether single or multiple declarations in one statement
        Parameters:
        var - The root node of the array variable declaration (holds the type as its token)
        index - The index of var's token in lex
        Returns:
        The index at the end of this statement

      • buildVarDeclArrayHelper

        public java.util.ArrayList<VarDeclArray> buildVarDeclArrayHelper(java.util.ArrayList<VarDeclArray> list,
                                                                 int index)
        Helper to buildVarDeclArray(). Used for multiple array declarations in one statement.
        Parameters:
        list - The list of array variable declarations to be added to
        index - The index of the new array variable declaration (where the variable name is) in lex
        Returns:
        The list of array variable declarations with the new one added to it
